name: selenium_javascript_execution
description: Execute JavaScript in browser context for advanced interactions

args: from selenium import webdriver; driver = webdriver.Chrome(); driver.get('https://example.com'); title = driver.execute_script('return document.title;'); print(f'Page title via JS: {title}'); driver.quit()

expected_output.example:
Page title via JS: Example Domain

JavaScript executed and returned value

args: from selenium import webdriver; from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By; driver = webdriver.Chrome(); driver.get('https://example.com'); element = driver.find_element(By.TAG_NAME, 'h1'); driver.execute_script('arguments[0].style.border="3px solid red"', element); print('Element highlighted with JavaScript'); driver.quit()

expected_output.example:
Element highlighted with JavaScript

DOM manipulation via execute_script

args: from selenium import webdriver; driver = webdriver.Chrome(); driver.get('https://example.com'); driver.execute_script('window.scrollTo(0, document.body.scrollHeight);'); print('Scrolled to bottom of page'); driver.quit()

expected_output.example:
Scrolled to bottom of page

Page scrolling executed via JavaScript
